title: [Large-Scale] Large-Scale Data-Driven Mathematics Learning Design and Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics knowledge (functions, calculus, statistics) and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Course for working professionals participating outside work hours, emphasizing application of mathematical concepts through hands-on practice and data analysis

learning_goals: Predict learner behavior patterns (login frequency, learning material utilization rates) with 80% accuracy by analyzing learning designs
Quantify the impact of learning design elements on learner satisfaction and mathematics problem-solving performance
Derive at least three effectiveness indicators for mathematics curricula based on large-scale learning data
Interpret individual learning data and propose personalized learning improvement plans

resources: Learning Analytics Tools (Google Analytics for Education, Power BI)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
